pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Rejection Metropolis Sampling (ARMS) via 'Rcpp' // An efficient 'Rcpp' implementation of the Adaptive Rejection Metropolis Sampling (ARMS) algorithm proposed by Gilks, W. R., Best, N. G. and Tan, K. K. C. (1995) doi:10.2307/2986138. This allows for sampling from a univariate target probability distribution specified by its (potentially unnormalised) log density.
